Hi, 

I been looking for a while for a text adventure creator that can work with multiplayer games over the net, and found Quest, which I'm pretty impressed with at the moment, although I haven't started using it yet. I have a few questions about QuestNet though...

1. Will you be adding PayPal as a payment type for it? This is the only one that I would be able to use, well the only one I would use, especially seeing I'm in th UK.

2. I guess I would always have to be the host of a game? I was wondering if there is any way of having it hosted remotly? I have broadband so it is no real problem for me, I'd just leave my PC on. But, I want it based around a website, how would I go about doing this do you think? Would I have to sort of schedule games or is it the sort of thing that people can join in at any time, mid game etc.

I understand my questions, but you may not!

Thanks in advance

Simon
